text:
Hi all,

We are looking for someone with experience in website development with the HS CMS tool to help update the design of an existing HS website. We have the html/css files for the updates and need someone who can efficiently apply these updates to the site in the HS CMS. 

Feel free to dm or email me at <mailto:nick@dodon.ai|nick@dodon.ai>

Thank you!
<@U08ECSZTW68> we can help you with that. I'll email you - comes from <mailto:JM@austinlawrence.com|JM@austinlawrence.com>
